name: ECDSARewardsDistributorEscrow
description: ECDSARewardsDistributorEscrow. A token holder contract allowing contract owner to allocate rewards to ECDSARewardsDistributor in phases. Each phase corresponds to a new reward interval allocated with its own merkle root used by stakers to withdraw their rewards.

eventDecorators.name: BeneficiaryUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: TokensWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: receiveApproval
functionDecorators.description: Funds the escrow by transferring all of the approved tokens to the escrow.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setBeneficiary
functionDecorators.description: Sets the provided address as a beneficiary allowing it to withdraw all tokens from escrow. This function can be called only by escrow owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws the specified number of tokens from escrow to the beneficiary. If the beneficiary is not set, or there are insufficient tokens in escrow, the function fails.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFromEscrow
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws all funds from a non-phased Escrow passed as a parameter. For this function to succeed, this PhasedEscrow has to be set as a beneficiary of the non-phased Escrow.
